item.title: How to make drop rarer?
item.dc:creator: @Ferity Ferity
item.description:
@Ferity wrote:

Are you using Delta?
If yes, open your source files, open config, then open ‘npcdrops’.
You will see something like

npcdrop = 1115 536 10 100 npcdrop = 1115 1077 1 2 npcdrop = 1115 2402 1 2 npcdrop = 1115 1107 1 2 npcdrop = 1115 667 1 2 npcdrop = 1115 35 1 2 npcdrop = 1115 7638 1 2 npcdrop = 1115 6585 1 5 npcdrop = 1115 746 1 3

The first number is the item ID, the secound is the amount, and the last number is the drop rate.
If it’s 100, then it’s a 100% drop, if it’s 1, then it’s a 1% drop, you understand?

Read full topic
